name: Create Front contacts from Google Sheets rows and add them to groups
description: Every time a new row is added in a Google Sheet, Make will automatically create a new contact in Front and send a message to that contact using Front. This example uses the sheet in [this link](https://docs.google.com/spreadsheets/d/1I_0ORbuaKUyehO5qj7l3iWRNYELfAuG5lQzLfyuSw9A/edit#gid=0).
